docs.snippet: Wrigley Field took a step in the direction of every major league baseball park in the country Thursday when a city commission unanimously approved a major expansion of planned renovations including several more electronic signs and erecting a Jumb...
docs.lead_paragraph: Wrigley Field took a step in the direction of every major league baseball park in the country Thursday when a city commission unanimously approved a major expansion of planned renovations including several more electronic signs and erecting a Jumbotron in the iconic home of the Chicago Cubs.

headline.main: Chicago Panel Expands Wrigley Field Makeover
headline.print_headline: Chicago Panel Expands Wrigley Field Makeover
